summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Infographic MVP. Backend APIs and frontend UI are fully functional. Main issue: EMERGENT_LLM_KEY budget exceeded causing generation failures.

critical_bugs.issue: EMERGENT_LLM_KEY budget exceeded - 'Budget has been exceeded! Current cost: 0.5066058, Max budget: 0.4'

ui_bugs.issue: Loading steps component not clearly visible during generation

integration_issues.issue: Frontend shows 520 error due to backend budget limit exceeded

passed_tests: Theme toggle button visible and functional
All UI elements present and accessible
Backend API structure and validation working
Full pipeline works when budget allows

success_percentage.backend: 83% (5/6 core functions work, budget issue blocks generation)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all UI works, minor loading state visibility issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: EMERGENT_LLM_KEY budget exceeded. Current cost: $0.5066058, Max budget: $0.4. Need to either increase budget limit or provide new API key to restore infographic generation functionality.
